content: Net interest income was $63 million for the third quarter, up $4 million from the previous quarter because the ongoing increases in the general level of interest rates propelled our loans and security yields higher and our average interest-earning assets driven by the sequential growth in loans from our continued strong loan production increased 2.7% or $181 million.
